main event: A solid ball with bright red exhaust was observed northeast of Palm Springs, California, which disappeared after one hour.
interesting points: The observation lasted for one hour.,The object was described as a white ball with bright red exhaust.,No size or shape was reported for the object.,The object was stationary during the observation.,The sighting was possibly linked to a weather balloon release according to some interpretations.
sighted object: solid ball with bright red exhaust
